thread.title: Adele releases new single 'Hello', first in three years | Entertainment & Showbiz from CTV News
thread.title_full: Adele releases new single 'Hello', first in three years | Entertainment & Showbiz from CTV News

author: Relaxnews
title: Adele releases new single 'Hello', first in three years | Entertainment & Showbiz from CTV News
text:
British singer Adele has released her first single in three years, with a video directed by Canadian filmmaker Xavier Dolan. 
"Hello" will features on her highly anticipated album "25," due out on November 20. In the new ballad, Adele is accompanied by a piano and drums and sings, "Hello from the other side / I must have called a thousand times / To tell you I'm sorry for everything that I've done." 
Greg Kurstin produced the album, which was recorded in Los Angeles. It is the first album since the Grammy winner's 2012 track "Skyfall" reached number 8 in the U.S. and number 2 in the U.K.
Watch the video here .
